recommendations.item: Grilled Salmon with Quinoa and Steamed Vegetables
recommendations.reason: Salmon provides healthy omega-3 fatty acids, quinoa is a complete protein and fiber source, and vegetables add vitamins and minerals. This meal is balanced and moderate in calories.
recommendations.modifications: Request olive oil or dressing on the side to control added fats.

recommendations.reason: Lean turkey provides protein, avocado adds healthy fats, and whole wheat offers fiber. A balanced option when paired with a side salad.
recommendations.modifications: Opt for mustard instead of mayo to reduce saturated fat, and request no cheese if calorie-conscious.

recommendations.item: Buddha Bowl (mixed greens, chickpeas, roasted sweet potatoes, tahini dressing)
recommendations.reason: Plant-based protein from chickpeas, complex carbs from sweet potatoes, and healthy fats from tahini create a nutrient-dense, balanced meal.
recommendations.modifications: Ask for dressing on the side and limit added nuts/seeds to control calories.

items_to_avoid.reason: High in unhealthy fats, refined carbs, and calories without balanced nutrition.
Excessively high in saturated fat and refined carbs with minimal protein or veggies.
Processed meats and high-fat cheese make this calorie-dense and unbalanced.

menu_recommendations.notes: Since no specific menu items were provided in the input, these are general recommendations based on common restaurant offerings that fit 'balanced moderate-calorie' goals. Always check portion sizes to align with calorie targets.
